class.name: PIXI.DisplacementFilter

parameters.name: texture
parameters.help: The texture used for the displacement map * must be power of 2 texture at the moment

class.help: The DisplacementFilter class uses the pixel values from the specified texture (called the displacement map) to perform a displacement of an object.\nYou can use this filter to apply all manor of crazy warping effects\nCurrently the r property of the texture is used offset the x and the g property of the texture is used to offset the y.

public.name: onTextureLoaded
public.help: Sets the map dimensions uniforms when the texture becomes available.

public.name: syncUniforms
public.help: Syncs the uniforms between the class object and the shaders.

public.name: map
public.help: The texture used for the displacement map. Must be power of 2 texture.

public.name: offset
public.help: The offset used to move the displacement map.

public.name: scale
public.help: The multiplier used to scale the displacement result from the map calculation.
